about_the_game:
[This game is currently under development. Wishlist now to be the first notified of its release!] 

Enjoy some cozy scrapbooking alongside a heartfelt story where you can... 

Solve Puzzles 

From simple and fun puzzles to complex ones, connect the dots using context clues from different aspects of the level and create something new! <3 

Find Romance 

Make choices that will lead Belle to find the love of her life. From celebrity crushes to first loves to forever, introduce a little romance into the mix! 

Get Scrapbooking 

As it says on the tin. Have fun letting your creativity fly by making different scrapbook spreads per themed level as you listen to some cool tunes. 

Make Decisions 

Influence the trajectory of Belle's life with different choices. Will she have her pre-teen goth phase or does she prefer a pop of bubblegum pink instead? Is she a theater kid or a high school cheerleader? What major does she choose in college? It's all up to you! 

Help Belle scrapbook the different stages of her life! Including... 

  • Childhood 

  • Tween Phases 

  • High School Life 

  • College 

  • And more! 

Support our small studio! 

Check out the links on our store page! Whether you help us by donating or by joining our community, every little gesture is a big step toward helping us complete our goals.

name: Paper Trails: A Scrapbooking Story Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 11 compatible graphics card with at least 1GB VRAM
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

short_description: A 2D puzzle game about cozy scrapbooking as you follow a little girl’s life. Solve puzzles to create the correct spreads and make choices that will influence Belle along her journey of growing up and reconnecting with her mother.
